title: windows 10 game crash after character selection
body: my game will not work wanted to try it out today but game crashes right after my game starts loading after character selection in the game if this is fixed i will take down this post but pls help me i have windows 10 I NEED HELP

replies.body: Can you give me some more detailed description of the crash? Were there any specific error messages that popped up when this happened? Any specific behavior that occurred?
